Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Mountain Province General Hospital in the Municipality of Bauko, Mountain Province, to Luis Hora, Memorial Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 836
An Act Changing the Name of the Mountain Province General Hospital in the Municipality of Bauko, Mountain Province, to Luis Hora, Memorial Hospital
Section 1. The Mountain Province General Hospital in the Municipality of Bauko, Mountain Province, is hereby called Luis Hora Memorial Hospital.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1Ã¢wphi1
Approved: April 27, 1984
